titleStmt.title: The great day of chancery A sermon preached at White-Hall, the last day of October. 1619. By Iames Forsith, one of his Maiesties chaplaines in ordinarie.
titleStmt.author: Forsyth, James, fl. 1615-1619.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
